div.p: SONNERATIA, in botany ; a genus of plants belonging to the claſs of icoſandria, and to the order of mon οgynia. The calyx is cut into six ſegments ; the petals are six; the capſule is multilocular and ſucculent ; and the cells contain many ſeeds. The only ſpecies is the acida.
